description: Indicates the reason why the transplant recipient needed to return to cardiopulmonary bypass support after the cardiothoracic transplant surgery.

columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: WHY_POST_TXP_CPB_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the reason why the transplant recipient needed to return to cardiopulmonary bypass support after the cardiothoracic transplant surgery.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Hemodynamic instability


Bleeding


Left ventricular dysfunction


Right ventricular dysfunction


Systemic vasodilation


Other
